nodes.text: Madeline Boni, aka Madnoliet, is an illustrator and concept artist based in Santiago, Chile, specializing in fantasy and science fiction themed artworks for TCG, RPG, Mobile App Games, as well as for private clients such as music bands and novelist.

She has worked on several Star Wars products of Fantasy Flight Games / ©Lucasfilm Ltd. as an illustrator mostly for the titles Star Wars: Armada, Star Wars: The Card Game. and Star Wars: Age of Rebellion RPG.
Some Star Wars artworks by Madnoliet for FFG;
-Guarding the Wing - product Draw Their Fire, Star Wars™: The Card Game
- The Defense of Yavin 4 on Madeline_Boni's profile on ArtStation (backup link) - product Spring 2015 Tournament Kits, Star Wars™: The Card Game
- Victory II-class Star Destroyer on Madeline Boni's profile on ArtStation (backup link) product Spring 2015 Tournament Kits, Star Wars(TM): Armada
- Black Squadron on Madeline Boni's profile on ArtStation (backup link) product Galactic Ambitions, Star Wars™: The Card Game
- MC80 Liberty Mon Calamari on Madeline Boni's profile on ArtStation (backup link) product Liberty Class Cruiser, Star Wars™: Armada
- Yavaris Nebulon-B Frigate on Madeline Boni's profile on ArtStation (backup link) product Nebulon-B Frigate, Star Wars™: Armada, card
- Demolisher Gladiator on Madeline Boni's profile on ArtStation (backup link) product Imperial Starship Expansion Packs, STAR WARS (TM): Armada card
